official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide spouses' and widows' benefits to certain divorced persons.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide spouses' and widows' benefits to a divorced spouse of an annuitant under specified conditions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide spouses' and widows' benefits to certain divorced persons.
